reuters.title: TRANSAMERICA <TA> TO HAVE AUSTRALIAN SALE GAIN
reuters.body: Transamerica Corp said it will have an after-tax gain of about 10 mln U.S. dlrs on the sale of its Occidental Life Insurance Co of Australia Ltd affiliate to <Pratt and Co Financial Services Pty Ltd> of Melbourne for 105 mln Australian dlrs. The sale was announced earlier today in Australia. Proceeds will be used to enhance the growth of North American operations of its Transamerica Occidental Life subsidiary, the company said. Reuter 
